topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c98ee636872055c000e46#post_559c98ee636872055c000e46
Honestly I'd say that not knowing is much worse.

If you knew what happened. You would be devastated for a bit if they died or something, But most would get over it eventually. If you don't know (And they were a big part of your internet life) It will probably hang with you for a longass time.
